TEXT: #bProblem Solver involves controlling multiple characters during combat. NL You can switch characters' positions using specific card effects.
During your turn, cards are played based on the buffs applied to the selected character. NL Additionally, unless stated otherwise, buffs or powers are granted to the selected character.
During the enemy's turn, the character in the front always takes the attacks. NL If the selected character dies, the next front character will take the attacks.
Characters who die during combat will revive with 1 HP after the battle. NL However, if all #bProblem Solver characters die before the battle ends, you lose the combat.
